DOC.brief_title: Comparison Tolerability Between Two Allergy Drops
DOC.criteria: Between age 18 inclusive . Males females Patient generally good & stable overall health . Patient likely comply study guideline & study visit . Informed consent sign . History allergic conjunctivitis Current symptoms allergic conjunctivitis assess investigator Corneal refractive surgery contact lens wear within 6 month study . Current use Restasis Intraocular surgery within 6 month ocular laser surgery within 6 month . Pregnant lactating woman . Ocular pathology ( include glaucoma cataract ) , could impact result and/or place patient risk .
